body_html:
Currently this PR supports only 2-d inputs. Are there thoughts about supporting n-d by treating any leading dimensions as batch dimensions (can either unsqueeze+expand over additional dimensions or materialize the full tensor)?

Hmm, torch.eye doesn't support n-d tensors yet too.
body_text:
Currently this PR supports only 2-d inputs. Are there thoughts about supporting n-d by treating any leading dimensions as batch dimensions (can either unsqueeze+expand over additional dimensions or materialize the full tensor)?
Hmm, torch.eye doesn't support n-d tensors yet too.
body:
Currently this PR supports only 2-d inputs. Are there thoughts about supporting n-d by treating any leading dimensions as batch dimensions (can either unsqueeze+expand over additional dimensions or materialize the full tensor)?

Hmm, `torch.eye` doesn't support n-d tensors yet too.
